page.title: 07Hill of Beath School Life
page.content: In our school there are 187 pupils with 6 teachers. We have now got 2 computer's in the school.There is a timetable and each class gets the computer every week.In our school we have a football team and a netball team who play in the Cowdenbeath League.In June they take part in a game for the Civic Week Trophy.Every year we have a sports day in Keirs Park.Primary 1 and 2 have it in the morning and primary 3 to 7 have their sports in the afternoon.Every Thursday 2 of the classes go swimming to a local pool about 20 minutes drive away.Once a week Mr.Reid the minister leads the service while our head teacher plays the accordian.Every Friday the choir practice is held,and every so often there is a concert which is sometimes watched by the
